message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think my product is worth more than $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $90. I'm willing to pay $95.
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I think we're getting close to a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $105
I think we're really close to a deal now. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
I think we're really close to a deal now. I'm willing to meet you at $99, but that's as low as I'm willing to go
